channel.title: Wyoming Tonight
channel.description: We gather and report Wyoming news from communities, the oil patch, the halls of the legislature, and even from Washington D.C. to tell you what’s going on in, and what affects Wyoming.
channel.itunes:author: Townsquare Media
channel.itunes:subtitle: Wyoming Tonight
channel.itunes:summary: We gather and report Wyoming news from communities, the oil patch, the halls of the legislature, and even from Washington D.C. to tell you what’s going on in, and what affects Wyoming.

item.title: Wyoming News: The Cole Creek Fire Near Casper Is On Its Way Out

item.description: You can still enroll for health insurance under the Affordable Care Act in Wyoming -- We call it the 'New Prison' in Rawlins, but it's falling apart after only fourteen years on the job -- Chronic Wasting Disease found in yet another new hunt area; near Baggs, this time. item.title: Wyoming News: At Least 12 Houses Destroyed, Many More Damaged; Cole Creek Fire Still 50% Contained
item.dc:creator: Townsquare Media
